text: Ekstraklasa is the top division in the Polish beach soccer league. == History == Started in 2012 as the Ekstraklasa, the competitions allow teams to compete in beach soccer in a league format over the June and July. Each season ends with a superfinal deciding the competition winner for the best six teams in Polish league. === Tournaments === {| class="wikitable" |- ! Season ! I tournament ! II tournament !
